functions.name: query_gemini
functions.description: **GOOGLE SEARCH via Gemini AI** - Search the internet using Google's Gemini AI with grounded search capabilities. Use this to get real-time information from the web including: current news, live sports scores, stock prices, weather updates, latest game patch notes, trending topics, product reviews, how-to guides, and any other information that requires up-to-date internet data. This function performs actual Google searches and returns current, web-grounded results. Use ONLY for queries requiring internet search. DO NOT use for: local system settings, GPU info, game performance queries, or topics that RISE handles locally.

query.description: The complete user question or search query to send to Google Gemini. This should be the user's exact question or a rephrased version that captures their intent. Examples: 'Who won the basketball game last night?', 'What are the best settings for Cyberpunk 2077?', 'How do I make chicken tikka masala?', 'What's the capital of Mongolia?'

context.description: [OPTIONAL] Additional contextual information that might help provide better results. Can include: current game being played, user's location, time of day, or any other relevant background information. Examples: 'playing Elden Ring', 'Los Angeles', 'evening gaming session'. Leave empty if no specific context is needed.
